Name: Oxford Radar RobotCar Dataset
Size of the dataset: Navtech CTS350-X Millimetre-Wave FMCW radar and Dual Velodyne HDL-32E LIDARs with optimised ground truth radar odometry for 280 km of driving around Oxford, UK

Name: UDayton24Automotive
